description: A wine from north antartica elaborated with rare icy-grapes, it comes from New Zeland, One of our sweetest wines :)... some more description here...
Special acid grapes wine with little biterness hints and couple of Chardonnay grapes extract, ideal to invite some friends :o
Classic malbec wine of our house, is our speciality Malbec wines, one of our best wines
Grenache and Cabernet grapes wine with acid hints that it'll combine with sweet of Cabernet flavour
